persona:
Name: David
Age: 35
Country: United States
Occupation: Mid-Market Investment Banker
Income Level: high
Tech Savviness: advanced
Primary Goal: Streamline complex financial modeling in Excel.
Pain Points: Complex formulas break easily, Time-consuming data consolidation, Difficulties in creating visually appealing presentations, Keeping track of changes among team members
Context: David works in a fast-paced environment where efficiency is crucial. He often handles large datasets and needs to ensure data accuracy and presentation clarity. He frequently collaborates with international teams.
